S:log-item.D:comment:
DERBY-129: CAST should warn about truncation
Made subclasses of SQLChar and SQLBinary generate a DataTruncation warning when they are truncated to a shorter value.
Pass warnings up to the statement from NoRowsResultSetImpl.
Make the network server transfer DataTruncation in a way the client accepts.
Update test canons to expect warnings on truncation.
